name: A goats tale
description:
The game is really short, only 5 levels, a brief but I hope fun experience.

Norssias art is sometimes a little bit lazy, don't blame me for it, the music is awesome though, Stef if did a really good job.

As for the gameplay, I think it is not too difficult, but it isn't the best out there, the theming of each level is what makes it fun and makes it fit the theme.

I only had limited art assets to work with(Norssia is a bit lazy), so don't expect much variety .

This is also my first ever game jam submission, so don't be too harsh on me.

The game may have some lag and bugs which I will probably fix post jam.

Leave any feedback in the comments!
